mapper.select: SELECT LOWER_NO, LOWER_TITLE, CASE WHEN LOWER_TYPE = 'A' THEN '차량' WHEN LOWER_TYPE = 'B' THEN '도보' ELSE '' END AS LOWER_TYPE, (SELECT CAR_NAME FROM LOWER_CAR_INFO WHERE CAR_NO = A.CAR_NO) CAR_NAME, CAR_NO, LOWER_START_HH, LOWER_START_MI, TO_CHAR(LOWER_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LOWER_DT, TO_CHAR(LOWER_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LOWER_REG_DT, LOWER_DEL_YN FROM LOWER_INFO A WHERE LOWER_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY LOWER_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOWER_INFO ( LOWER_NO, LOWER_TITLE, LOWER_TYPE, CAR_NO, LOWER_START_HH, LOWER_START_MI, LOWER_DT, LOWER_REG_DT ) VALUES ( LOWER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{lowerTitle}, #{lowerType}, #{carNo}, #{lowerStartHh}, #{lowerStartMi}, #{lowerDt}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT LOWER_NO, LOWER_TITLE, CASE WHEN LOWER_TYPE = 'A' THEN '차량' WHEN LOWER_TYPE = 'B' THEN '도보' ELSE '' END AS LOWER_TYPE, (SELECT CAR_NAME FROM LOWER_CAR_INFO WHERE CAR_NO = A.CAR_NO) CAR_NAME, CAR_NO, LOWER_START_HH, LOWER_START_MI, TO_CHAR(LOWER_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LOWER_DT, TO_CHAR(LOWER_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LOWER_REG_DT, LOWER_DEL_YN FROM LOWER_INFO A WHERE LOWER_DEL_YN = 'N' AND LOWER_NO = #{lowerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE LOWER_INFO SET LOWER_TITLE = #{lowerTitle}, LOWER_TYPE = #{lowerType}, CAR_NO = #{carNo}, LOWER_START_HH = #{lowerStartHh}, LOWER_START_MI = #{lowerStartMi}, LOWER_DT = TO_DATE(#{lowerDt},'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE LOWER_NO = #{lowerNo}
UPDATE LOWER_INFO SET LOWER_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE LOWER_NO = #{lowerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOWER_CHILD_INFO ( LOWER_CHILD_NO, CHILD_NO, LOWER_NO, CHILD_NAME, LOWER_CHILD_REG_DT ) VALUES ( LOWER_CHILD_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{childNo}, #{lowerNo}, #{childName}, sysdate )
